mapper.select: SELECT SNSNO, USERNO, PERMISSION ,CONTENT, LIKEY, PHOTOCOUNT, PHOTOGROUP, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS WRITEDATE FROM SNS WHERE PERMISSION = 0

SELECT SNSNO, USERNO, PERMISSION ,CONTENT, LIKEY, PHOTOCOUNT, PHOTOGROUP, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS WRITEDATE FROM SNS WHERE (USERNO=#{loginNo}) OR (PERMISSION = 0) OR (USERNO IN (SELECT FRIEND FROM FRIEND WHERE USERNO=#{loginNo}))
